gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pacers 132, 76ers 126
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pacers defeated the 76ers, 132-126. Tyrese Haliburton led the way for the Pacers with 33 points (seven 3PM), seven rebounds, 15 assists and 0 turnovers, while Obi Toppin added a season-high 27 points, along with 6 rebounds in the victory. Joel Embiid tallied 39 points, 12 rebounds and six assists for the 76ers in the losing effort. The Pacers improve to 2-0 in East Group A play, 7-4 in the regular season, while the 76ers fall to 1-1 in East Group A play, 8-2 in the regular season.
